home.title: Photography is capturing moments, preserving memories, telling stories without using words.
home.subtitle: This is my digital space. I am a photographer committed to capturing unique moments and telling stories through light. My work spans documentary, architectural, landscape, and portrait photography, always seeking an authentic and emotional approach.

about.title: About me
about.p1: Hi! I'm Oscar Duran, a photographer passionate about capturing beauty in everyday details. My journey in photography began over a decade ago, and since then, I haven't stopped exploring the world through my lens.
about.p2: I specialize in documentary and landscape photography, always seeking the story hidden behind each scene. I believe a good photograph not only shows what something looks like, but how it feels.
about.p3: This portfolio is a collection of moments that have moved me, and I hope they inspire you too.

contact.title: Contact
contact.p1: Interested in collaborating or have a question about my work? I'd love to hear from you.
contact.p2: You can reach me via my email:
